content.raw:
I was wondering what was the desired behaviour here. I feel like at this point, Debug by default should be a better option? Maybe we should change the expectation in sdformat and gazebo instead of changing the type here? I'm not sure...

That's why I thought of changing the tutorial instead :) 
https://bitbucket.org/osrf/gazebo_tutorials/pull-requests/350/tweaks-to-windows-install-instructions/diff
